title: Milan Ferdian, Plany Kolejist II, Segmentova Kolejiste.pdf
description:
Great publication from Czech republic (Czech Language!) from awesome author: Milan Ferdian, he is mark of quality in Czech and Slovak republic,
this publication is aim to exactly model railways behind iron curtain, very detail model plans, everyone hand painted!

Rare publication!

Now is very hard to buy one!
As i know on first part from this author soon will be impossibile get any one!

I hope in this way will catch you hearts from all over the world! And will be next publication what need save for next generations!

This publicationÃ‚Â´s motto, as Czech people say, very much music on small place.

This book is split to 7! sections.

In first section author show how young railroad modelers during communism must use space for their dream railroad layouts and split it on parts. Very interesting view to communism era and into peopleÃ‚Â´s building from this era.

Again we can look on 50 plans every one is hand painted!

This book is masterpiece!

In this book is plans for 4 scales! H0 scale, TT scale, N scale and Z scale is new! 

Book contains 7 parts:

Obsah (Content)
- uvod (preface)
- tradice (tradition)
Kolejiste - "Tradice" (Trackage - "Tradition")
- 1. Zacler
- 2. Simplon
- 3. Hodni & Dolni Paseky
- 4. Vysoke Veseli
- 5. Lokomotivni Depo 
- 6. Lhotka
- 7. Liny
- 8. Otovice zastavka
- 9. Hustopece
- 10. Dvorce
- 11. Slunicko
- 12. Vinohrady
- 13. Senomaty
- 14. Sanov
- 15. Mankovice

Kolejiste - "Segmentova" (Trackage - "Segment")

Kolejiste - "H0 do kapsy" (Trackage - "H0 to pocket"

Kolejiste -"A neco navic" (Trackage - A little extra")
